reviewText: Excellent video. Will revolutionize your concept of prayer; once again Louie Giglio has made it clear that it is not all about us!
excellent dvd!  it is so inspiring and completely changed my prayer life. it made me see how prayer is really supposed to work.

Wonderful  as all his messages are ..haven't been clear to the end of  it but just about  and have more of his DVD's for  sure recommend them to everyone .....highschool and college  kids...anyone who you think would understand  the message for sure should watch

This DVD is such a blessing from God. Louis giglio has a great calling and you can see the spirit of God in his sermons
Can not recommend this enough, an must buy
Because he started using man's word instead of God's!!! In order to obtain a copyright a bible must change the meaning of the words Two hundred times!!! KJV or man you choose

Loved these messages on prayer.  They were great for my small group.

Louie did a great job truly "remixing" what we think about prayer and how we pray for things.
Louis Giglio holds my attention as always. He gives great insight on prayer in our daily lives and I can apply his message to my own life.

I have watch Louie Giglio at the church I attend.  I was so impressed with the way he has responded to Gods calling and how he convays thruth from the Bible. His energy is infectious and sets my soul and heart on fire.  I wanted his DVD so I could watch them any time I want to.

I was beginning to think I was the only one reading the Bible and I had it wrong about what God wanted in prayer.  After generations of being preached AT and drilled into you one certain way to pray, you begin to think maybe you are the one that is wrong and not vice versa.  FINALLY,  A  VOICE IN THE WILDERNESS  COMES THROUGH LOUD AND WITH A CLEAR MESSAGE.  What a refreshing message.  I had become sad as to how to pray and what to pray even with ALL the upbringing and books I have read.  Satan makes you begin to doubt and give up hope.  Jesus Christ is the answer even in your weakness He will not forsake you. He loves you!
Prayer remix is an absolute must ,& atreat if you enjoy Giglios unique perspective of the WORD!! He again takes us places most Christians are not comfortable with but yet need to visist daily!!
This DVD was awesome, I saw it for the first time at a church men's Retreat in pine valley, Utah. Loved it had to order it to watch with my wife and its just a must own
Very good study on prayer. Makes one think
My favorite Louie Giglio series!
excellent
I'm a giglio fan, but, not crazy about remix
Very good teaching
Mom my got this and loves it. She has watched it several times.
Very powerful series  on prayer that will change your prayer life.
One of the best teachings on prayer that I've seen in a long while!
A very blessed message and like all of these sermorns by Passion Ministry, great.
It has been a month since our group watched them and it is still reverberating through us in our prayer lives.  Wakes you up to common everyday facts.  Thank you
